testsuite.test:
Preconditions
Instructions: 1) Hold the device in PORTRAIT mode! 2) For the next tests hold the device in PORTRAIT mode (until told otherwise)! 3) Click 'GO'!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Portrait mode check min max width
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Portrait mode check min max height
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Portrait mode check min max device width
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Portrait mode check min max device height
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Preconditions
Instructions: 1) Hold the device in LANDSCAPE mode! 2) For the next tests hold the device in LANDSCAPE mode (until told otherwise)! 3) Click 'GO'!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Landscape mode check min max width
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Landscape mode check min max height
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Landscape mode check min max device width
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Landscape mode check min max device height
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
